import {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import {Modal,ModalOverlay,ModalContent,ModalHeader,ModalFooter,ModalBody,ModalCloseButton,Button,useDisclosure,Lorem} from '@chakra-ui/react' export default function Forecast(e) { const [data,setData] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ setData(e.e); },[e]) const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure() return (
Modal Title

Min_Temp

{e.day.avghumidity}%

{e.day.mintemp_c}

) }
